detaileddescription.para:
The type of process
0 the process will behave as a CG master
1 the process will be a MUMPS Slave

briefdescription.para: To define wether it's Fortran-Style (1) or C-Style (0)
The number of partitions.
A reverse index of columns, contains the original index of each column for each partition.
A merge of col_index vectors, determines non-null columns in all local partitions.
The solution vector.
Contains the mutual interconnections between partitions The key is the cg-master rank (in inter_comm) and the value is the column indices.
Contains the partitions that are handled by this instance.
The communicator shared by CG masters.
The communicator of local slaves.
The number of rows in the linear system.
The number of columns in the linear system.
The number of nonzeros in the linear system.
The number of right-hand sides to solve.
The path where to write the matrix $PD_rAD_cP^T$.
The path where to write the matrix $S_k$ where $k$ is the mpi-process rank.
The file where to write logging information.
The row indices.
The column indices.
The entries of the matrix.
The right-hand side.
The solution vector.
The symmetry of the matrix.
The starting row index of each partition.
The number of rows per partition.

detaileddescription.para: The number of parallel CG instances

briefdescription.para: Scales the matrix the norm at which the matrix is scaled.
Computes the norm of the matrix.
Partitions the matrix into abcd::nbrows.
Analyses the structure of each partition Compresses the and analyses the interconnections between them.
Assignes each mpi-process to its category : CG-master or MUMPS-Slave.

inbodydescription.para: the final solution (distributed) w = ^+ b f = ^+ b
